name: John Xina's Social Credit Score Tester: Chinese Christmas
name_original: John Xina's Social Credit Score Tester: Chinese Christmas
description:
Merry Christmas, Happy Holidays, and Happy New Year!

Welcome to John Xina's Social Credit Score Tester: Chinese Christmas!

It's the end of the year, and you, a humble Chinese citizen, are called for your yearly social credit test. When you get there, everything seems normal, but wait! the person giving you your test is none other than John Xina himself!!!

Features:

- Several Unique Endings 

- Fun, Likeable Characters 

- Total Nuclear Domination 

- Social Credit Score Testing 

and so much more!

What are you waiting for Citizen, get your test done!

You wouldn't want to have low credit, would you...?
